title: When will our beloved Rammus get a new skin?!?!?
body:
Rammus needs love, and its been awhile I think our armordillo got a skin, so he must need a new skin rite? {{champion:33}} Put a couple ideas below :3










Poro Rammus     - 2 Cute 



Officer Rammus   - Would be the funniest ever :D I love dis idea personally cuz its ok



Guardian of the Sands Rammus  - Just a small idea of what it can look like color wise. http://img2.leaguecraft.com/skins/asset/skin_0_760px_3515_1.jpg

replies.body:
Hey Mr Rammus (such a fitting name, by the way),

It's funny you should mention a new Rammus skin, especially one that would be named Guardian of the Sands. 

Youuuu should totally check out the latest PBE update! :D
I have just witnessed Guardian of the Sands Rammus, it is 100/10 such bootiful :') marry me rito, you didn't forget rammus :') {{champion:33}}
So glad you like him! :D (I had this page up on my work computer for a few days, just waiting for him to hit the PBE.)
Aha, Cant wait to buy it instantly :') {{champion:33}} I knew they would do the Guardian Of The Sands Rammus, I had a feeling.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0E7XNnEf,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-25T00:01:37.678+0000)
>
> Hey Mr Rammus (such a fitting name, by the way),
> 
> It's funny you should mention a new Rammus skin, especially one that would be named Guardian of the Sands. 
> 
> Youuuu should totally check out the latest PBE update! :D

DEAR MOTHER GLUB THEY'RE BEAUTIFUL

{{champion:81}} "But officer, I didn't do anything wrong!"

{{champion:33}} "Ok."

{{champion:81}} "So can I go?"

{{champion:33}} "Hmm."

{{champion:81}} "PLEASE?"

{{champion:33}} "Ok."

{{champion:81}} "Really?"

{{champion:33}} "Yeah."
When he roles he gains flapping wings on his sides... yes... he becomes a **Blue Shell**!!!

LOL! What a coincidence that Rito is releasing a GOTS Rammus skin.
I say its Illuminati, but thats just me.

This post.

Illuminati confirmed.

IDK, thats strange.
I'd love a Tonberry Rammus skin.
Rammus the hedgehog, make it happen riot, fix your game
